document.full_text: a tunisian court has rejected an appeal by the party of former president zine al-abidine ben ali against a ruling that it be dissolved, the official tap news agency said monday.
document.title: tunis court confirms dissolution of ben ali party
lines_and_colors: a tunisian court has rejected an appeal by the party of former president zine al-abidine ben ali against a ruling that it be dissolved, the official tap news agency said monday.
